content: {{warningMessageMyDocuments}} All shared files as well as rooms created by this contact will be reassigned automatically to an admin performing the deletion: <1>{{userPerformedDeletion}} ({{userYou}})</1>. Reassign data manually to choose another destination user for reassignment.

comment.text: This translation key provides a warning message displayed within a profile deletion dialog, explaining that files and rooms associated with the deleted user will be automatically reassigned to an administrator. It clarifies that the user performing the deletion is <1>{{userYou}}</1> and offers the option to manually reassign the data to another user.
